message.body: apologies if my advice got incoherent and unconstructive. I got very suddenly nauseous and tired last night. do what's right for you and she should be able to understand
You were very helpful and I'm so glad to have your support. She sent me an email this morning that said "I'm sorry I was so upset"
I'm not sure because that's all it said. But hopefully it means that she'll come around to how things are: apart for now and in the future we'll see...
guess that's the best you could hope for. she can't really be endlessly upset with you because your circumstances were never as simple.
